# This file contains the adjusted month: # Data source: Fig 1 in Bartlein and Shafer (2019)
# period: corresponding periods to the PMIP4 experiments
# age (ka): corresponding ages to the PMIP4 experiments
# <month>Days: number of days of each month
# <month>Mid: mid-day number of each month relative to Jan 1st at 0 ka
# <month>Beg: start day number of each month relative to Jan 1st at 0 ka
# <month>End: end day number of each month relative to Jan 1st at 0 ka
# VE_day:  vernal equinox day number relative to Jan 1st at 0 ka
# SS_day: summer solstice day munber relative to Jan 1st at 0 ka
# ndays: number of days in the year
